price: Na Ismail, na Al Yasaa, na Yunus, na Lut'. Na wote tuliwafadhilisha juu ya walimwengu wote.
arabic: وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَٱلۡيَسَعَ وَيُونُسَ وَلُوطٗاۚ وَكُلّٗا فَضَّلۡنَا عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: Na tuliwaahidi Ismail, na Alyasaa, na Yunus, na Lut'; na tukawafadhilisha kila mmoja wa hawa wote kushinda walimwengu wote wa zama zao, kwa kuwapa uwongofu na Unabii.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-is'māʿīla wal-yasaʿa wayūnusa walūṭan wakullan faḍḍalnā ʿalā al-ʿālamīna
